description.value:
The devil makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 5d6 type=poison average=true]] damage, and the target must succeed on a [[/save con 14 format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's &Reference[darkvision]{darkvision}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
